sect1.title: PARALLEL PARALLEL function

row.entry: Optional. The action name, which turns the action into a definition, therefore not executed until the definitionname is used as an action.
A comma-delimited list of the actions to execute simultaneously. These may be ECL actions or external actions.

sect1.para: The PARALLEL action allows the items in the actionlist to execute simultaneously. It does not force parallel execution, only allows it -- the compiler determines the actual execution order. This is already the default operative mode, so PARALLEL is only useful within the action list of a SEQUENTIAL set of actions.
